sentences.en: At any rate that feeling was wholesome.
sentences.cn: 这种感情至少还是健康的.

sentences.en: In actual fact the things I like doing are mostly wholesome.
sentences.cn: 实际上我喜欢做的事大都是有助于增进身体健康的.

sentences.en: It is not wholesome to eat without washing your hands.
sentences.cn: 不洗手吃饭是不卫生的.

sentences.en: It seems not meet, nor wholesome to my place.
sentences.cn: 那看上去不合适，也无益于我这地方。

sentences.en: It wouldn't be wholesome for you to go there.
sentences.cn: 你到那儿去恐怕不安全.
它是个有益健康的地方。

sentences.en: Like a puff of wholesome , blustery wind the doctor was off.
sentences.cn: 医师象一般清新的劲风那样,飞也似地走了.
牛奶是有益于健康的食物.

sentences.en: She was really fond of his strength, his wholesome looks, his manliness.
sentences.cn: 她真喜欢他的坚强, 他那健康的容貌, 他的男子气概.

sentences.en: The food is filling and wholesome.
sentences.cn: 这种食物既能充饥又有营养。

sentences.en: This has had a wholesome effect on babies.
This is not a wholesome situation.
sentences.cn: 这种局势存在着潜在的危险.

sentences.en: You should read some wholesome books.

words.tran_cn: 卫生地；有益健康地；审慎地；安全地
有益于身心健康；增进健康
